title: SEPT 2022-Beautiful 4 bed, Pet Friendly, W/D in Unit!
posting_body: SEPT 2022-Beautiful 4 bed, Pet Friendly, W/D in Unit!
Spacious 4 bed 1 bath with in unit laundry!
Fully Renovated East Cambridge 3 & 4 Bedroom apartment Homes in Unbeatable Location Near Restaurants, Bars, Shops, Parks, and Cafes as well as Public Transportation.
Featuring Beautiful Hardwood Floors Throughout, Luxury Granite/Stainless Steel Kitchen with All Appliances Including Dishwasher and Garbage Disposal.
Great Sized Living Room and Large Bedrooms with Great Sunlight Throughout Entire Apartment.
Huge Back Yard Provides Great Highly Desirable East Cambridge Outdoor Space.
In Professionally Managed and Maintained Building.
PLEASE RESPOND WITH YOUR ACTUAL EMAIL ADDRESS OR PHONE NUMBER TO ENSURE YOU RECEIVE MY RESPONSE!
Call Aidan at 201-449-4090 or respond with your name, phone number, and email for further information or to schedule a showing!
